settings.content: TERRA Water Baby Wipes are made with 99.7% pure New Zealand water and ultra-soft biodegradable bamboo fibre, giving your baby a gentle, simple, and soothing clean. Free from fragrances, alcohol, and harsh chemicals, they're ideal for delicate and sensitive skin, everyday care made pure and effortless.

settings.prepaid_continue_as_prepaid_text: Prepaid order will auto-renew after {count} orders
settings.prepaid_continue_as_standard_text: Becomes a regular subscription after {count} orders

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
1. Open the safety lid and gently pull out a wipe.
  2. Clean the desired area using soft, sweeping motions.
  3. Use additional wipes if needed for thorough cleaning.
  4. Close the lid tightly after each use to keep wipes fresh and hydrated.
  5. Dispose of the used wipe in household waste, do not flush.

settings.heading: Ingredients¬†
settings.content:
• Pure New Zealand Purified Water.
  • Biodegradable FSC Certified Bamboo Fibre.
  • Benzalkonium Chloride (Antibacterial Agent).
  • Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Flower Extract (Calms and Comforts Skin).
  • Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract (Soothes and Protects Sensitive Skin).
  • Tocopherol (Vitamin E) (Provides Antioxidant and Moisturising Care).
  • Glycerin (Maintains Skin Hydration and Softness).
  • Caprylyl Glycol (Natural Preservative and Skin Conditioner).
  • Levulinic Acid & Sodium Levulinate (Natural Antimicrobial Stabilisers).

settings.text: See how our wipes safely biodegrade in marine environments, protecting waterways and sea life.

settings.heading: What materials are the wipes made from?
settings.content: Each wipe is crafted from 100% biodegradable, FSC-certified bamboo fibre and contains 99.7% purified New Zealand water.

settings.heading: How many Terra wipes come in the mini pack?
settings.content: Each Terra mini pack contains 10 full-sized wipes, making it perfect for nappy bags, travel, quick errands, and unexpected clean-ups when you're out and about.

settings.heading: Can I use these wipes on my baby's face and body?
settings.content: Yes, they are gentle enough for full-body use, including the face, hands, and nappy area.

settings.heading: How often can I safely use Terra Wipes?
settings.content: Terra Wipes are designed for daily use and can be used multiple times per day whenever needed. Their plant-based, skin-friendly formulation ensures they remain gentle even with frequent use.

settings.heading: Are Terra Wipes cruelty-free?
settings.content: Yes, all Terra products, including our wipes, are 100% cruelty-free and never tested on animals.

settings.heading: Where are Terra Wipes manufactured?
settings.content: Terra Wipes are proudly made in New Zealand, following the highest international safety and quality standards.

settings.heading: How should I dispose of Terra Wipes?
settings.content: Terra Wipes should not be flushed. Please dispose of them in your household waste or compost bin, if suitable and available.

settings.subheading_faq: Explore answers to the most common questions about Terra Water Baby Wipes, crafted to give you clarity and confidence.
